profile.name: Jheng Lin
profile.content1: Bachelor of Landscape Design, National Taiwan University
profile.content2: Studying BSC Computer Science in Goldsmiths, University of London

list.title: Multilingual
list.content: Fluent in Mandarin (verbal / written). Intermediate in English (verbal / written)

list.title: Aesthetic
list.content: Have a really high standard of aesthetics, and also good taste in visual design.

list.title: UX
list.content: Keen on user centered design to make websites more accessible and easier to use.

section2.title: Skills
section2.content: Including visual design and programming languages, these tools are my favorite which help me create projects.

final.content: I'm now looking for a summber front-end web development internship in UK, welcome to send me message via the contact page. Thank you so much!
